data.title: Water temperature in Rodrigues in Indian Ocean now
data.meta_description: What is the current water temperature in Rodrigues in Indian Ocean? How the water temperature will change in Rodrigues in the coming days. Statistics for recent years.
data.text:
Mauritius

Rodrigues

Sea water temperature in Rodrigues today

Rodrigues, Mauritius | © Laurent Soulie

The most detailed information about the water temperature in Rodrigues in Indian Ocean (Mauritius). Forecast of changes in water temperature for the next 10 days. Statistics by months for recent years. Information about the neighboring resorts. Weather forecast in Rodrigues for a week.

Water temperature in Rodrigues right now

data updated 9 minutes ago

23.1°C

yesterday: 22.9°C

a week ago: 23.3°C

Trend: slow drop

Today water temperature in Rodrigues is 23.1°C. It is the most comfortable swimming water in any body of water, especially on a hot day. This temperature range is recognized as the most optimal for prolonged bathing. In any case, the general weather is also important. So, the air temperature at the same time will reach 21°C.

Analysis and forecast

The water temperature today roughly corresponds to the average value on this day in recent years. Its value has rise over the last week, but has drop compared to 20 days ago. Exactly a year ago, on this day, the water temperature in this location was 23°C. Water temperature range in Rodrigues in August is from 21 to 25 degrees.

According to our forecast, in the coming days, the water temperature value in Rodrigues will slightly drop and in 10 days it will be 22.1°C.

* Fact - Actual value of water temperature

** Average - Average water temperature on this day in past years

*** Forecast - Our forecast for the water temperature

Actual nearshore temperatures may vary by several degrees from the indicated values. This is noticeable after heavy rain or after prolonged periods of strong winds. Some downstream winds cause cold, deep waters to replace surface waters that have been warmed by the sun.

To develop a forecast, we use our own mathematical model, which takes into account the current change in water temperature, historical data and the main weather trends, wind strength and direction, air temperature in each specific region. We also take into account data for other resorts in Mauritius.

Velika, Greece | © Moja Grcka

Annual graph of average water temperature change in Rodrigues

Water temperature in Rodrigues by month

Rodrigues is located in the Arctic Circle, at latitude 19 degrees. The swimming season in this location lasts all year round. Average annual water temperature on the coast in Rodrigues is 25.9°C, by the seasons: in winter 24.4°C, in spring 24.3°C, in summer 27.5°C, in autumn 27.5°C. Minimum water temperature (22.3°C) in Rodrigues it happens in September, maximum (30.0°C) in February.

You can find out detailed data on how the water temperature in Rodrigues changes in each specific month:

The warmest water today in Mauritius recorded in Mahebourg, its value is 25.0°C. Lowest - in Rodrigues, there water temperature now 23.1°C. Average water temperature in the country today - 24.5°C.

Water temperature data in Rodrigues and neighboring towns and resorts collected from various sources, using buoys, using satellite maps of sea, river and lake surfaces of the NOAA agency.

We use data from various local authorities in each specific location of the world to more accurately reflect temperature values.

The nearest airport is located in a 8 kilometers. This is Sir Charles Gaetan Duval (RRG) airport. We have no information as to whether it is valid and what flights it receives or sends.

Find out the temperature of sea water in more than 12000 cities and resorts around the world. Water surface temperature values are available in real time. There is a forecast of water temperature changes for the next few days, as well as historical data of sea surface temperature are available for all days of the last years.

We use data from various sources, including National Centers for Environmental Information (NOAA), meteorological services of different countries, data received from more than a thousand buoys around the world, satellite systems for scanning the surface of the oceans and seas.
